titles.title: Farm Payment Loophole Elimination Act of 2016
A bill to amend the Agricultural Act of 2014 to repeal a loophole for payment limitations.
Farm Payment Loophole Elimination Act of 2016

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Farm Payment Loophole Elimination Act of 2016
This bill amends the Agricultural Act of 2014 to apply to family farms the requirement that recipients of farm subsidies be actively engaged in farming. The bill eliminates the existing exemption for family farms that permits family members that are not actively engaged in farming to receive farm subsidies.
